title: Bootstrap Interview Preparation
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Test Yourself

### Common Questions
1. **Reset vs Normalize vs Reboot**: Bootstrap uses Reboot (built on Normalize) to standardize defaults.
2. **Container vs Container-Fluid**.
3. **Explain the Grid System math**.
4. **Bootstrap vs Tailwind**: Bootstrap = Components (Faster start). Tailwind = Utilities (More flexibility).
5. **Semantic Class Names**: Why strictly using `col-md-6` might be considered non-semantic.
summary: A review of the technical depth behind the framework.
